home.name: I'm Barbara Rajič
home.about: I love coding, cats and jigsaw puzzles

about.description: Hi, I'm Barbara, a geological engineer turned front-end developer from Zagreb with a flair for creating engaging web experiences. Transitioning from the structured world of engineering to the dynamic realm of coding, I've found my true calling in the pixels and possibilities of web design and development. My approach blends analytical rigor with a creative spirit, ensuring that each line of code not only functions but also tells a story. Whether it’s a sophisticated web app or a sleek website, my goal is to build solutions that resonate with users and stand out in the digital landscape. I believe in continuous learning and am always on the lookout for the next challenge.

portfolio.title: PinGo
portfolio.description: PinGo is a workout app designed to seamlessly track your fitness journey by mapping your workouts and keeping you engaged with interactive route tracking.

portfolio.title: Budgetary
portfolio.description: Budgetary simplifies personal finance with an intuitive budget management tool, crafted to help you smartly organize your spending and savings.

portfolio.title: Elena Joy
portfolio.description: This is a simple, responsive landing page for showcasing the photography portfolio of Elena Joy.
